channel.title: My Living Room! Radio Show
channel.description:
NOW PLAYING: NOIZECAST II
Featuring The Best In Indie Music and News Primarily From Canada and the UK!!!
Log onto our myspace page NOW at http://www.myspace.com/mylivingroomradioshow to download the latest broadcast featuring the BEST in Indie music,news and more!
Join our Facebook Group BritGirl Productions TODAY!!!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show - Classic Rewind 3rd Birthday Edition!
item.description: Happy Birthday to My Living Room!!! Welcome to the August edition of the show and celebrate the 3rd year of the My Living Room! Radio Show with a re-run of one of my favorite broadcasts! Featuring some of the best in new and old Indie music from all genres, this was one of my best hip-shaking music mixes ever! Cheers!
item.dc:creator: My Living Room!
item.itunes:summary:
Happy Birthday to My Living Room!!!
Welcome to the August edition of the show and celebrate the 3rd year of the My Living Room! Radio Show with a re-run of one of my favorite broadcasts!
Featuring some of the best in new and old Indie music from all genres, this was one of my best hip-shaking music mixes ever!
Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show July 2009
item.description: Welcome to the July edition of the My Living Room! Radio Show! This month's show features new music from Santigold, Mod Amish, The Bird and The Bee, U.S.E, Miss Kittin and The Hacker and much, much more! Cheers!
item.dc:creator: My Living Room!
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the July edition of the My Living Room! Radio Show! This month's show features new music from Santigold, Mod Amish, The Bird and The Bee, U.S.E, Miss Kittin and The Hacker and much, much more! Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show June 2009
item.description: Welcome to the June 2009 edition of the My Living Room! Radio Show featuring music from Fleet Foxes, West Indian Girl, Larry McDonald, The Noisettes, Japandroids, King Khan and the Shrines and more PLUS an interview with Canada's Emma-Lee! Download the show to your ipod, MP3 Player or computer for your continuous and best Indie music stream! Enjoy - cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show May 2009
item.description: Welcome to the living room May music special - The Magnificent Women Of Indie Music! Featuring tracks by the Yeah Yeah Yeahs (Karen O), The Noisettes (Shingai Shoniwa), Blonde Redhead (Kazu Makino), Sharon Jones and The Dapkings, Bjork, Lykke Li and much, much more DOWNLOAD NOW for maximum pleasure! Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! April 2009
item.description: Welcome to the April edition of the My Living Room! Radio Show! This month's show features music from Ohbijou, The Rural Alberta Advantage, Grand Analog Featuring Shad, Zaki Ibrahim, Dan Mangan, Metric and much, much more! Enjoy - Cheers!

Enjoy - Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show March 2009
item.description: Check out the My Living Room! Radio Show Canadian Music Week Special! Featuring music by Arkells, Hey Rosetta!, M.I.A, NIN, Awaking State, Constantines, Radiohead and much, much more - this promises to be the best CMW music mix YET! Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show February 2009
item.description: Welcome to the February edition of the My Living Room! Radio Show! This month's music mix features new Indie music from Bon Iver, Metric, The Golden Filter, Mos Def, Lukestar, Of Montreal, Franz Ferdinand and much, much more! Cheers!

item.title: My Living Room! Radio Show January 2009
item.description: The first music broadcast of 2009 features new music by The Kings of Leon, Kanye West and Flying Lotus, Grace Jones, Au Revoir Simone, Jay-Z featuring Santogold, The Ting Tings, Death Cab For Cutie, Peter Tosh and much, much more!
